In a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken, two rebels just might be able to restore order: Max, a man of action and of few words, and Furiosa, a woman of action who is looking to make it back to her childhood homeland.

Director: George Miller
Writers: George Miller, Brendan McCarthy
Stars: Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult
Genres: Action | Adventure | Sci-Fi | Thriller
Country: Australia | USA
Language: English


Mad.Max.Fury.Road.2015.TS.XVID.AC3.HQ.Hive-CM8

Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time

Sources:

Video: 720P Source Video - iNCOMiNG
Audio: Mr.Seen-Simple-Jiinx
thx m8s

Notes:

had the 2 week old sd source already prepared which i had invested encoding for hours in case audio drops, could have done that version 2 days ago
but when i heard a 720p version is out now too, i decided not to bother you with that instead i got the 720er file and postponed for san andreas release first

last night i had time to work on that new 720p file, its a lot better than the avi the others used, its not jerky anymore, but came with the usual problems
video had lots of noise in it, had pulsating flicker and the colours are off a lot, mostly reddish

Encoding:
removed the flickering, removed the noise in the video and ran extensive filters for the colouring, wasnt easy but doable
added brightness, fixed contrast, black base, white base, rgb,saturation,yuv, so we get a nice colouring now the movie has even a blue sky

I havent added additional sharpness to either of the both versions, cause it totally ruins fast action scenes,which this movie has all the time, its perfect as it is

for the audio i used jiinx line, which was sweet but needed my usual cleaning process
the audio from the sd version didnt fit the slightest to 720p cam so i had to resync the whole movie in the usual lipsync matter

all in all took me good 10h but its perfect now
this will do me till retail

got very nice
enjoy
